author: Satoshi Nakamoto
content: Animoca Brands, a venture capital firm focused on gaming and the metaverse, has made an investment in the TON ecosystem and has become the biggest validator on the TON blockchain network. The Hong Kong-based company is supporting TON Play, a project that aims to build gaming infrastructure within the ecosystem. Animoca Brands has not disclosed the details of its investment when contacted by CoinDesk. In September, Telegram endorsed TON as its preferred blockchain for Web3-related developments, potentially reaching its 800 million user base. Animoca Brands is also in talks with Saudi Arabia's NEOM for a $50M investment. Edited by Sheldon Reback.
title: Animoca Brands: Largest TON Validator.
